EmailTemplate.subject: Let Office Depot help you stay healthy this Cold & Flu Season
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
We are committed to helping your clients and staff stay ahead of the game this cold and flu season!
Did you know that over 111 million working days were lost to American business through cold and flu? Also take in account the 189 million school days missed annually in America due to colds and flu. The missed time costs the American economy $7 billion per year lost productivity and sick time.
We value the American people and their health. Although millions of Americans are expected to get sick with a cold or flu this yea, we are partnering with Clorox and Georgia Pacific this flu and cold season to lower that expectation. Attached are some tools you can reference to prevent illnesses.
If we all partner together to stay ahead of the cold and flu season game then together we can maintain healthy environments!
